Friends... educate yourselves a little on how to make things work, when you steal. Or buy the game:) One command in terminal:
chmod 755 /Applications/AngryBirdsStarWars.app/Contents/MacOS/AngryBirdsStarWars

Change the path to angrybirds.app accordingly to your installation.

P.S. Buy the game anyway ;)
